bill.title: Amends existing law to establish provisions relating to a school safety plan; to revise provisions relating to the Public School Income Fund and the use of moneys and to revise provisions relating to uses of an appropriation.
bill.description: Amends existing law to establish provisions relating to a school safety plan; to revise provisions relating to the Public School Income Fund and the use of moneys and to revise provisions relating to uses of an appropriation.
